member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AutoActivationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for automatically activating singletons after application starts.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AutoActivationExtensions.ActivateKeyedSingleton(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Enforces keyed singleton activation at startup time rather than at runtime.
member.param: The service collection to add the service to.
The type of the service to activate.
An object used to uniquely identify the specific service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AutoActivationExtensions.ActivateKeyedSingleton``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Object)
member.summary: Enforces keyed singleton activation at startup time rather than at runtime.
member.param: The service collection containing the service.
An object used to uniquely identify the specific service.
member.typeparam: The type of the service to activate.

member.summary: Enforces singleton activation at startup time rather than at runtime.
member.param: The service collection containing the service.
The type of the service to activate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AutoActivationExtensions.ActivateSingleton``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AutoActivationExtensions.AddActivatedKeyedSingleton(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Type,System.Object,System.Func{System.IServiceProvider,System.Object,System.Object})
member.summary: Adds an auto-activated keyed singleton service.

An object used to uniquely identify the specific service.
The factory that creates the service.
